member.name: T:VL.FlexUI.Yoga.YGValue
member.summary: Value struct that supports point/pixel values, percentages, Undefined and Auto special values.

member.name: M:VL.FlexUI.Yoga.YGValue.Percent(System.Single)
member.summary: Factory method for creating a Percent value.
member.param: Percent value. E.g.: passing 100 returns a value of 100%.
